summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of West Myrtle Street, from 31st Avenue Southwest to 35th Avenue Southwest; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 12359 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
